about.bannerSubtitle:
Korea's largest
Festival of Young Buddhists,
about.title: Korea’s largest youth Buddhist festival, <Young Camp>!
about.mtitle:
Korea’s largest 
youth Buddhist festival, 
<Young Camp>!
about.subtitle:
A festival where Buddhist clubs come together to share their thoughts and support each other. 
We invite you to Young Camp.
about.msubtitle:
Buddhist clubs come together to share their thoughts, 
A festival to support each other, 
We invite you to Young Camp.
about.content:
Young Camp is an event carefully prepared from start to finish by the Dongguk University Buddhist Student Association Student Planning Committee.

This Young Camp is a project that originated from the deep intentions of Grand Master Jaseung.
Monk Jaseung wanted to widely spread the teachings of Buddhism among college students and provide a festival venue where young Buddhists could enjoy themselves to their heart's content.

After the monk passed away, Chairman Dongwan took up this wish and provided both material and spiritual support so that the Young Camp could be held successfully.
Through this event filled with the monk's warm heart, we hope that you will all newly experience the beauty and depth of Buddhism and enjoy the joy of being together.
Thank you.


- All members of the Dongguk University Buddhist Student Association Student Planning Committee -
about.mcontent:
Young Camp is an event carefully prepared from start to finish by the Dongguk University Buddhist Student Association Student Planning Committee.

This Young Camp is a project that originated from the deep intentions of Grand Master Jaseung.
Monk Jaseung wanted to widely spread the teachings of Buddhism among college students and provide a festival venue where young Buddhists could enjoy themselves to their heart's content.

After the monk passed away, Chairman Dongwan took up this wish and provided both material and spiritual support so that the Young Camp could be held successfully.
Through this event filled with the monk's warm heart, we hope that you will all newly experience the beauty and depth of Buddhism and enjoy the joy of being together.

Thank you.

- All members of the Dongguk University Buddhist Student Association Student Planning Committee -
